pr_title: SAK-44718: SAMIGO - A lot of scroll on settings page

timeline.message: SAK-44718: SAMIGO - A lot of scroll on settings page

timeline.bodyText: what happens when the accordion is expanded? Does it produce a scroll bar in the iframe, or does it cause the iframe to grow automatically?
timeline.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: Now, there isn't any iframe. I answered the same question to @ottenhoff some days ago.
replies.author: jesusmmp

replies.bodyText: Sorry, didn't see that. Ok, cool, thanks.
replies.author: adrianfish
